channel.description: Recent content in Civic Tech Grand Rapids Citizen Labs Open Budget on Citizen Labs

item.title: FY2018 Budget Added to Open Budget: GR
item.description: Interested in the City of Grand Rapids’ budget, but don’t have time to thumb through the 326 page document? A great place to start in learning more about the nearly $530 Million budget is by visiting Open Budget: Grand Rapids. What’s New? Open Budget: Grand Rapids now includes the FY2018 budget information that was approved by the City Council in June 2017. An interactive timeline of the budget process.
